Literature.Title: Specifically targeted antimicrobial peptides synergize with bacterial-entrapping peptide against systemic MRSA infections.
Literature.Author: Xu B, Wang L, Yang C, Yan R, Zhang P, Jin M, Du H, Wang Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=32µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml)
